Hi Jean-Baptiste,

There is some research in this direction. I'm currently looking at
Ofer Shir's recent PhD thesis, which combines niching with CMA-ES:

http://www.liacs.nl/~oshir/oshirphd2008.pdf

I don't know (yet) how this niching scheme differs from the one of NEAT.

Julian


2008/10/5 Jean-Baptiste Mouret / Mandor <mandor@...>:
> Hi all,
>
> I've a question regarding adaptive and self-adaptive schemes and
> Jeff's paper: I understand that such approach could make things worse
> if the search get stuck in a local minima; but what could we expect if
> we combine them with a (hopefully good) diversity preservation
> nechanism (e.g. the one in NEAT)?
>
> My intuition is that the diversity should work against the "trap" of
> the local minima in this case.
>
> Best regards,
> --
